title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate Terraform Provider development workflows with Kiro (DVT216)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 加速 Terraform Provider 开发工作流程 (DVT216)
abstract: AWS's biggest customers rely on Terraform as their front door to the cloud. In this session, HashiCorp reveals how Kiro has dramatically accelerated their Terraform Provider development workflow. Learn the practical tips and best practices their team discovered while implementing Kiro. Discover how this collaboration is helping deliver cutting-edge AWS capabilities to Terraform users faster than ever before.
abstract_cn: AWS的最大客户依赖Terraform作为他们进入云端的前门。在本次会议中，HashiCorp揭示了Kiro如何显著加速了他们的Terraform Provider开发工作流程。了解他们团队在实施Kiro过程中发现的实用技巧和最佳实践。探索这种合作如何帮助比以往更快地向Terraform用户交付前沿的AWS功能。

presenter.name: Paul Stafford
presenter.title: Principal Worldwide Specialist, GenAI, Kiro and Q Developer
